lx4p

Class LXPRadioGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • lx4p.LXPRadioGroup

  • public class LXPRadioGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    LXPRadioGroup is a controller for a group of RadioButtons only a single station (button) can be selected at a time

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int buttonCount
      the number of buttons in this group
      LXPRadioButton[] buttons
      array containing the buttons in this group
      int selected
      the index of the selected button or -1 if no selection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LXPRadioGroup(int size)
      construct an array to hold buttons buttons must be added with calls to addButton

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LXPRadioButton addButton(int xp, int yp, int r)
      add a button to the group
      LXPRadioButton buttonAtIndex(int index)
      get a particular button
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
      draw the buttons in this group
      boolean mousePressed()
      check to see if a button was clicked and if so, set the station
      LXPRadioButton selectedButton() 
      void setSelectedIndex(int index)
      sets the station selected by this button group
      void setStation(LXPRadioButton srb)
      sets the station selected by this button group

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • buttons

        public LXPRadioButton[] buttons
        array containing the buttons in this group

      • buttonCount

        public int buttonCount
        the number of buttons in this group

      • selected

        public int selected
        the index of the selected button or -1 if no selection

    • Constructor Detail

      • LXPRadioGroup

        public LXPRadioGroup(int size)
        construct an array to hold buttons buttons must be added with calls to addButton
        Parameters:
        size - the maximum number of buttons in this group

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        draw the buttons in this group
        Parameters:
        p - the Processing Applet containing the button group

      • mousePressed

        public boolean mousePressed()
        check to see if a button was clicked and if so, set the station
        Returns:
        true if station was changed

      • addButton

        public LXPRadioButton addButton(int xp,
                       int yp,
                       int r)
        add a button to the group
        Parameters:
        xp - x coordinate of the center of the radio button
        yp - y coordinate of the center of the radio button
        r - radius of the circle representing the radio button
        Returns:
        the new LXPRadioButton

      • selectedButton

        public LXPRadioButton selectedButton()
        Returns:
        the selected button or null

      • buttonAtIndex

        public LXPRadioButton buttonAtIndex(int index)
        get a particular button
        Parameters:
        index - of the button in the array, should be < buttonCount
        Returns:
        LXPRadioButton

      • setSelectedIndex

        public void setSelectedIndex(int index)
        sets the station selected by this button group
        Parameters:
        index - zero based, should be < buttonCount

      • setStation

        public void setStation(LXPRadioButton srb)
        sets the station selected by this button group
        Parameters:
        srb - the button representing the selected station
